t: New To Brand Metrics
s: Thanks for the post. Brand Metrics help quantify opportunities for your brand at each stage of the customer journey on Amazon. t: New-to-brand metrics | Perpetua Help Center
s: These metrics give advertisers the tools to estimate the cost of engaging new customers on Amazon and identify the most efficient channels and tactics to achieve their campaign goals. A new-to-brand customer is a customer who has not made a purchase of the brand in a 1 year look back window.
